name: Gun to the Zone
description:
Gun to the Zone is a fast paced top down shooter that calls back to simpler times. You'll have random loot, awesome runs and plenty of action, but if you only have time to play for 10 minutes, that is okay too!

The game takes place in an alternate reality where a great calamity has created something the people call "the Zone".

There are rumors about strange artifacts that are supposed to exist inside. Only the bravest make it to the center.

  • Shoot, reload, dodge and use special attacks
  • Find powerful guns - they're different each run
  • Fight monsters, beat mighty bosses and discover artifacts
  • Earn coins and buy buffs in between runs
